values: Have you ever tried to step in my shoes?

To me you're an angel
You're a knight in shining armour
For me to say that "I don't need you!"
Would be furthest from the truth
But it's not my place to keep you
I'll never say "Please stay!"
Our construction paper hearts may not read "together forever"
and that's just something I'm going to have to deal with.

"Is this life, to grasp joy only to fear its escape? The price of hapiness is the risk of losing it."  

  To confide in an online journal, a blog, available for all the world to see and comment on if they so choose, is the last thing I actually felt like doing tonight. And still I type. Funny the way things work out, isn't it?
  I recently took it upon myself to make a change in my outward apperearence. I get bored with myself and often desire new looks in hopes that I might actually look pretty in one. Rarely am I pleased with any attempt; even still, I sniffed out a pair of well hidden scissors last night and began snipping away at my hair until I ended up with what I now have no choice but to wear. You'd think that I would have had enough change after dying my auburn locks purple, dark brown,adding streaks ranging from white to orange to pink to cherry red, and finally settling on a nice clean black. You'd also be wrong. I'm temporarily satisfied, but who knows how many weeks may pass before I get bored again. 
  I'm continually pissing myself off by neglecting schoolwork. I should be writing up a lab report for AP Environmental Science as well as completing some shit for AP Art History not to mention going over a reading assignment due in English. I keep telling myself that I'm going to apply myself but I get so distracted. My mind isn't in the right place. I worry about my mother. Her being in and out of the hospital is causing me to fuck up my school attendance record. Sure, they are excused but having so many absences doesn't exactly make my character look all too appealing. My grades are mediocre. I know I am so much better than that, yet I skip classes and do stupid things that really don't reflect well on myself. There are so many things in my life that already don't make it easy for me, and I go and make things even harder on myself. Self-pity certainly isn't getting me anywhere. I've got to straighten up.

My absence from Livejournal, the love of my life, amazes me.  I never thought that I would turn into one of those Xanga freaks... but who am I kidding. I am weak. I'm a sucker. *punches self*

I've also sort of gotten a life. That's neat. Well I'm leaving you again.

So I wrote a little bit in my notebook...

Pictures on a wall are all that's left of broken hearts because the next steps that we take will only break us more apart and everything we used to say has faded into yesterday the feelings that were deep inside are trying harder to subside...

Ramble on, Brittany. Ramble on.
We live in a beautiful world.

http://pg.photos.yahoo.com/ph/brittikittie/album?.dir=/8868&.src=ph

 

And here's a link to some pics of a darn good time. Me and the boys, yo. (boys meaning Andy, Josh, and Rex the demon dog)  Good times.

Elvis movies and lots of sarcastic bullshitting...delicious.

I'm in love with a book. I'm going to marry it. Is that sad or what? Who needs a man when you've got a good book? Not me, bitches. Not me.


"How quickly the fabric of our lives unravels.  We weave together protective tapestries of assumption and false belief that are torn to shreds beneath the malevolent claws of reality.  Grief is a merciless schoolmarm."


"There are moments, it would seem, that were created in cosmic theater where we are given tests. In these times, we do not show who we are to God, for surely He must already know, but rather to ourselves."

I can't stop laughing. My friends make me live. I love them. I love Starbucks too. I've been listening to one song over and over again. I would tell you what it was but if you look up at the subject of the entry you could just as easily figure it out for yourself, bitches. heh heh heh. And if not....that's even better. 

I need money. My life revolves around improving my body, remaining at peace with the world around me, and FINDING WAYS TO GET MONEY!!!!!!! If anyone knows someone who needs a babysitter or a house cleaner.... I'm here and ready to go. When I get back from Europe I am getting a job. As well as cleaning houses and babysitting. And I have to leave time for the gym. And then there's church and oh yeah... School. That shit. Fuck school. Not really though. Busy girl. Busy girl. I should practice my viola. I think I'll do that. Right after I paint.

I love my icon. Everytime I look at it I get a happy feeling inside of my little pink heart. It's grrrreat. Oh Tony the tiger... what a mack. Mandy and I finished our Word Processing together. We went halfsies. Cheating rules. Much like a massive bowl of cookie dough ice cream. Heavens yes! Katie and I were planning out her berfday bash that will be conceived by us and enjoyed by us. I had the BEST ideas for her cake EVER! But I shant go into any more details for fear that someone will ruin the originality and majesty of the cake of glory. It deserves to be special. Number one- it's for Katie. Number two- It's her golden birthday. Number three- I'M DECORATING IT!!!! MWAHAHAHAHA!!!! With the help of the berfday girl of course. But. Still. Me+Katie+Cake Decorating=PURE MAGIC! Bailey is staying the night with Katiekins tonight. I'm jealous. I want to play with my girlies. Oh well. Have fun kiddos. I'm going to try and catch up on some sleepy sleep. Oh yeah. AND do my English project. MUTHASUCKA! That sucks so many lollipops!!!! GAWD. Now I've gone and stolen my own sunshine. I need to go to my rock down by the river. Let's go KT. You seem to be in need of an old mossy friend as well. What IS up with everybody and their significant others? You guys suck. But I still love you. With all of my little-pink-construction-paper-heart-with-lots-and-lots-of-pretty-glitter. 

Feel for me. I have no pizzazz. 

Please just don't play with me my paper heart will bleed. This wait for destiny won't do. Be with me please, I beseech you. Simple things that make you run away. I'll catch you if I can...

What if God was one of us?

tee hee.

Weezer time. I love life. I've had such a good day. I've had a good week. I like myself. You can like me too if ya-ont-to. Woo. Being Literate is fun. It's so crazy how Flora and Rose were identical twins. I thought to myself "Well wouldn't it be cool to run into another Brittany at Community Bakery one day?" And then I died. Ok. Maybe I made that last part up. But I love you. And I'm in like. And that's terrific.

Heaven's not a place that you go when you die 
It's that moment in life when you actually feel alive 
So live for the moment 
And take this advice, live by every word 
Love is just a hoax so forget anything that you have heard 
And live for the moment now 


i don't know what to say. i'm too lazy to actually write things that matter in here. i'm happy. i love life. i love bright sunny days and pretty little flowers. love is all you need. oh...and maybe a couple of disney movies to pass the time.

wait for the sun to set.
wait for the stars to shine.
wait for the one i was destined to pine for.
together on this blanket.
forever lost in time.
your hand will find mine and with luck it will find more.

I absolutely adore Little Nathan. Got to meet his famliy tonight. That was cool. I really liked his puppy dog. It was too cute. Rev+Me+Little Nathan=fun fun fun. I can't believe that he burped and said it was me. That was no burp. That was a roar. And those scary ladies thought it was ME! And the stinky old man was a nice touch as well. And let's NOT forget the comb=over guy. Nathan: "FOUR HAIRS!" hahahahahahahahahaha. Rev looked like she was pissing her pants she was laughing so hard. I love those times. Little Nathan is now our property people. Rev stuck our flag in him first. We claim him. Here's to more good times ahead. woo-sha-sha!

I feel I must interject here you're getting carried away feeling sorry for yourself
With these revisions and gaps in history
So let me help you remember.
I've made charts and graphs that should finally make it clear.
I've prepared a lecture on why i have to leave
So please back away and let me go


Don't you feed me lines about some idealistic future
Your heart won't heal right if you keep tearing out the sutures

Friday at school consisted of me repeating over and over again that everything was alright beacause "I'm drinkin' tonight." Now I know that's not something to really be proud of or gloat about or anything like that... I was just excited about hanging out with my friends that I haven't been able to in forever. 

A lot of things happened at Andy's that night. A lot of really cool unexpected things. Went and kidnapped little Nathan from his home and made him come play. He's adorable. Rev and I just want to put him in our pockets. I talked to Robbie online and he said that he'd go to the zoo with me and that made me happy. Then the night lasted forever it seems. Tried to make Shane take me to Pine Bluff for some reason, lol. Got to know Andy's cousin a little better. Read the dictionary. Didn't really sleep. I think I slept a little after 6 or so and got up at 9 something. I took Alissa home and then came back to Andy's and spent the day with those little boys, lol. I eventually took my neice to Chuck E Cheese for her birthday and then came home and crashed. Only to wake up every couple of minutes to either text someone back or answer his stupid phone call. Jews. I swear, lol.

And now I have no clue what the heck is going on in my life. All I know is that I like it and I'm happy. I like the way things are and that's a real first for me. Who knows how long the happy will last considering I AM back at home with my mother. The queen of happiness killers. But I'm going to watch the Oscar's and paint at Rev's house so she won't be killing the happy tonight. Wooo.

I want to bottle up this feeling and get drunk off of it everyday of my life.

I started off my day asking Robbie if he was on crack. His eyes looked CRAZY. But he was just sick. Awww. He was still adorable though. 

First period... I thought I was going to kill over. We had this 80 year old speaker guy telling us about journalism. And I mean it is interesting... but he started telling us his life story. And I started passing out. And then I look back at Lenee and she looks dead. And then over to my right sits good ole Sarah Snyder passing out as well. And then she says that she has to go boo boo. And that makes me laugh. That poor old man. Poor us. Stupid Mr. Smith.

Second period was just Mr. Watson. That's all there is to say. 

Third period... me, Katie, and Bailey oh yeah, and the guy with the HUGE boner... lol! Good times.

4th period Mr. Anderson saved me from Ms. Jones. WAHOOOOO! I love that man. I really do.

What a boring day. Poop on a stick. Oh well.

To: All Employees of STINKY CHEETAH Inc.

It has come to my UGLY attention that the CLUTTERY has been SOFTLY SMOKED UP with ROUND VAMPIRES. I am tired of dealing with FAT employees and their ROUND VAMPIRES. The CLUTTERY is meant for SPANKING. It is not a PENCIL room.

On a more PINK note, I would like to SHIT all of you for the YELLOW work you all did on the LIMEGREEN ZIPLOCK BAG account. You should all be HUNGRILY DRANK.

Also, be sure to welcome BUBBA, the newest member of the TOOTHBRUSH department. They will be a BEAUTIFUL HAND to our family.

AIMLESSLY Yours,
Mr. NEONORANGE, DONKEY Supervisor.

Saw a fight afterschool today. I got hit and so I hit back and screamed "don't fucking touch me bitch I'm not in this" and then they kept on fighting in the other direction. So I followed them and then jumped up on a table so I could have a good view. YAy Mills.

Rev and I went on a texting frenzy and texted lots of people saying dirty things. Teehee. Good times.

Oh BeeGees. How I love thee. I'm addicted. I grew up with them...forgot about them...and now Momma got that new cd and I can't stop listening to it. It makes me feel like a little kid again dancing around the house and cleaning up. I've always been a dorky little chubster, lol. But I'm FUN!

*And you may not think that I care for you, But you know deep inside that I do, and it's me you need to show-HOW DEEP IS YOUR LOVE*

I am really sad about the suicide of Hunter S. Thompson. One of my favorites. Taken some great quotes from that man in my day. And now, there will be no new ones. That's really depressing. And I hate that we had to lose him to suicide. 

I should watch Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas. 

I have nothing to say. I'm really tired yo.  

Nobody gets too much love anymore it's as high a mountain and harder to climb.

You scored as Druid. The fury of the storm, the gentle strength of the morning sun, the cunning of the fox, the power of the bear-all these and more are at the druid's command. The druid however, claims no mastery over nature. That claim, she says, is the empty boast of the city dweller. The druid gains her power not by ruling nature but by being at one with it. To trespassers in a druid's sacred grove, to those who feel the druid's the distinction is overly fine.

Drums keep pounding rhythm to my brain, ladedadedee ladedadeda.

Relentless ranting would be pointless. No need to do so. I am happy with my life. I'm happy with the person I have grown to be. But even in the broadest of daylight lies the faintest shadow of darkness. We all have our worries and doubts. Everyone deals with confusion and identity crisis. It's all part of growing up. My confusion lies not with my integrity...I mean. I know who I am. I am Brittany. And that's all I know how to be. I am the product of a covetous mother and a muted father. I am the portrait painted by friends recycled and lost. Under the influence of older "cool" kids and family members who seem to have disappeared, a shy chubby little chipmunk learned to sing and to laugh and to cherish her loved ones as well as her surroundings. She grew from a chubby little chipmunk without an opinion to a bright young woman with enough wit and charisma to crack a smile on her FATHER's crinkled face. And that's quite an achievement. I know who I am. I am Brittany Nicole Porter. I am the girl who walks into closed doors while off in a colorful daydream. I am the girl that never takes the time to think about the words coming out of her mouth. I am the girl that dazes out in a conversation and then tosses and turns all night over the words she COULD HAVE said but hadn't thought of at the right moment. I am the girl that beats herself up for not making a move when the moment was right. I am the girl who prays to whatever's out there for a sign that things aren't always what they seem. I am the girl suffering of romanticism with every thought revolving around this world's chaotic beauty. I know exactly who I am. So why is it that I cannot make my mother approve of who I am? Why is it that I cannot hold my father's attention for more than five minutes? Why is it that I spend my days chasing? Why can't I relax and revel in all of the wonderful things that I already have? Why must I chase? I really hate chasing my parents. I hate chasing the affections of those who have no intention of letting me catch it. You can't always get what you want. But patience is a virtue. It's a beautiful life.

Alissa spent the night with me last night after a pretty groovy time at Danyelle's. I cleaned the day away and alissa spent the entire time in my bathroom organizing it and scrubbing it. I love you, Lissa-burr. You rock my socks. 

My mom was quite pleased when she came home. That was good. I took Alissa to taco bell and then dropped her off at her mommy's work. Then I went and got Kaylie from my sister's house and we went with mi madre to wal*mart. Now we are home and listening to the BeeGees. It's great. My dad is nowhere to be found and it's just us babes. My mom hasn't yelled at me. I've been my normal sarcastic self. Everything is perfect. I got some new clothes and they are in smaller sizes than what I normally buy. I love the swimming pool. Getting smaller is greatness.  

My sister has left a voice message on my phone saying "TAG YOU'RE IT!" Because we are losers that play phone tag. Now I must call her. wheeeeeee family.

This weekend should be fun. Kelly Clarkson... I love her. That's just all there is to say. Well... and maybe "SINCE U BEEN GONNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNE!"  THAT's all there is to say. 

Now I'm off to play with Kaylie. Who know's what we'll do. Probably destroy something. That's always fun. Or maybe we'll jump on the bed and throw pillows around. Or maybe we'll put on too much make-up and take pictures. Maybe we'll just chill and watch a movie. Maybe I'll shut the hell up and actually DO one of these things... witcha!!!

~starshineyes~



LJ friendsCollage. Brought to you by and .

So it's really hot in here. I should take it off. Well. I would if I wasn't at school. I'd take it off and replace it with my bathing suit and jump right into the pool. I'm going to the gym again tonight. I love swimming more than FOOD. It's truly beautiful. My day was wonderful. I haven't been able to say that in a long long time. But today, dammit, I'm saying it. Not one bad thing made me feel down or low. I was happy happy or just off in a daze. And when I'm off in a daze I'm happy because my dream world is the best place a Bwitnay could ever be. I haven't visited my imaginary family in a long time either. I miss them. In fact. I think I'll daze off in the car and see how they are doing this afternoon. Hope I don't die, kids. Daydreaming behind the wheel of a car is quite dangerous. But I'm pretty good at it so. Don't start calling dibs on my awesome earthly treasures just yet...

How come I never hear you say, "I just wanna be with you"? Guess you never felt that way. BUT SINCE YOU BEEN GONE!!!!!!!!!!! I can BREATHE for the FIRST TIME! SINCE YOU BEEN GONE, YEAH, YEAH! Thanks to YOU, now I GET, I get what I WANT. 

I need to go shopping. I'm such a girl sometimes. I can't help it. Shopping??? hmmm. Sounds like a job for LENEE AND JULIA!!!! My shopping expert and my german lover. 

Well I'm out like a light. Mandy has made me want to laugh at other people's misfortunes. I love you.

How happy is the blameless Vestal's lot! / The world forgetting, by the world forgot / Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind! / Each pray'r accepted, and each wish resign'd. 



Valentine's Day is a holiday invented by greeting card companies to make people feel like crap.

I dont want to go back to school. If I could still be sitting on that rock by the river with Katie gosh darn it, I would be. 

I hate responsibillity. I hate knowing that some things rely on my cooperation. I wanna be free!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  But for now, I'll just eat some more chocolate. 

Stupid Valentines Day. 

Goodbye loves.

I actually spent time with my FATHER!!!! It's amazing. And it was fun. Rev came along too, so you know we had a jolly good time. We went out to eat, went to Cingular, and then to Barnes and Noble. He bought the Illustrated Beatles lyrics for me. I love it. Reveille and I plopped onto my bed and went through the entire book and sang every song. We rule. The fab four would be proud. Then we watched Return of the King for the rest of the night. God. Orgasm all over the place. That's twice in one week for me. Sheesh. I do not regret a single second. Legolas and Aragorn. Mmm Mmm Mmm. Arwen. Mmm Mmm Mmm. Shut up, me. Very well then. 

Rev and I woke up this morning a couple of times before we actually woke up. The first time was when I was dreaming about Rev. She was talking to the church congregation. She was asking them and God if she should change underwear or wear the ones with shit stains. I was having convulsions of laughter in my sleep and Rev woke me up asking if I was okay. And then I told her about my dream and laughed some more and passed back out.

We finally got up and watched Babes in Toyland. Then we watched a bit of Ghost World before leaving for her house. We got here and realized we wanted coffee so to Barnes and Noble we went. Ran into Nathan and Sarah(Ping-Ping) and sat with them for a bit. Then we came home and ate White Chilli. Tasty stuff. I talked to most of my favorite people all at once. Rev, Yellers, Katie, Bren Bren, and Robbiekins. A bunch of bafoons. Gotta have it, though. Gotta have it. 

I'm not one for gossip... but I heard that Danyelle smells like monkey butt, Katie licks the bottom of her shoe, Brendan wears pull-ups with sailboats on them, and Reveille likes crackwhores on Saturday nights. That's just what I heard. :-P

I don't know if I say this enough... but I really love my friends. All of you kids. You complete me. Jeezie Creezie. I don't even know what to say. I would also like to say to Keesha that I am here for her if she ever needs me. For the times that you feel like you have not a single friend in that hellish Wilbur D, remember that I love you, kiddo. And you can always come to me. I rhyme. So you know it's true, lol.


Man oh man. I need some caffeine of some sort. "Goodnight, all!"

The smile on your face made her think she had the right one
Then she thought she was sure
By the way you two could have fun
But now she might leave
Like she's threatened before
Grab hold of her fast
Before her feet leave the floor
And she's out the door
'cause you want

To keep her in your pocket
Where there's no way out now
Put it in a safe a lock it
'cause it's home sweet home

And in your own mind
You know you're lucky just to know her
And in the beginning all you wanted was to show her
But now you're scared
You think she's running away
You search in your hand for something clever to say
Don't go away
'cause I want

To keep you in my pocket
Where there's no way out
Put it in the safe and lock it
'cause it's home sweet home.

I don't wanna go to school. But I have to. CRAP ON A STICK! SHIT ON A SHINGLE! LUCY IN THE SKY WITH DIAMONDS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Don't wake me I plan on sleeping in.

Should this really make me happy? lol. I'm insane.

Stupid Sickness. I fart in your general direction. I cleaned today. I made my bed with the help of Reveille, who then hops into it and snuggles with my teddy bear. So I cleaned AROUND her. While she watched Donnie Darko. In my bed. With my toys. Oh well, lol. At least I cleaned that room of mine. It needed it. But as you all should have already known... my mother doesn't give a shit about the good things that I do. So as I was cleaning she comes up and tells me that I have to cook dinner. And I say "ok", but we don't have the groceries to make it. So she throws a big fit and finally puts some clothes on and goes to the store like a responsible adult and buys groceries. I keep cleaning. She gets home and starts dinner and expects me to know when to come in and finish it. I am sick. So after I finsihed cleaning my room, the guest room, and the bathroom I laid down next to Rev and watched some of the movie. And kinda fell asleep. So my mom goes crazy and starts banging stuff around in the kitchen and yelling at me and making a bigger mess. So I jump up and go try to help her. But she doesnt want my help anymore. She wants to yell at me. Dinner was ruined (even though it was just fine) and it was all my fault. She then sat down and did her daily crossword while I finished up in the kitchen and prepared a plate for everyone, except Rev who had made her way to the kitchen and made her own. I asked my mom why the meat looked different than usual and she blew up on me, saying that she probably got the wrong kind and it's all my fault becuase she has bad eyesight. She didn't have her glasses with her when she went to the store so she picked up the wrong stuff so it's my fault. And I told her that it sounded like she had a problem. And she yells "YEAH I HAVE A PROBLEM, YOU STUPIDASS, PEOPLE WHO CANT SEE USUALLY HAVE A PROBLEM!!" So then I took a breath and tried to ignore her calling ME a stupidass and told her that I was sorry for being sick and I couldn't go out to the store for her and do her job as mother of the houselhold but as for the whole not wearing glasses even though she knows that she has poor eyesight, and then blaming everything that goes wrong in her life on me, it seemed like she may need to grow up a little bit. So of course she's screaming at me by that point, telling me that I am the one that needs to grow the fuck up and start doing something with myself and cooking and cleaning and working an 8 hour job like her, and how she does everything around this house and I do nothing. She doesn't even know what AP classes are, yet she's sure that my schoolwork isn't as hard as I make it out to be and that I'm just a lazy bum who would rather be out with my friends than at home with a father who's never around and won't talk when he is, or a mother that picks fights for no fucking reason and blames it all on me simply because "i'm the daughter and she's the mother, so i must be wrong."  And with that...I stop trying to communicate with her all together.

Skipped with a few of my loves 4th period. Sweetness all around. I love my friends. I wish I could have carted ALL of my friends with me. THAT would have been wondermous. One day...heh heh heh heh heh....

B'nay spent the night with D'nelle last night. 'Twas fun as always. She is the Romy to my Michelle. And I, the Laverene to her Shirley. Good times. Good Good times.

Hung out at Rachiepoo's house tonight. Met Blake. Hott stuff, baby, this evening. I'll tell you what, lol. More good times.

I miss my Katie. Stupid orchestra kept us apart the other day. *sadness* 

Bren Bren... I am sick. I am following in the O'Neals footsteps and staying home tomorrow. Make it go away. 

I don't care what anybody says... IM HANGING OUT WITH REV TOMORROW NO MATTER WHAT!!!!! SICKNESS OR NOT!!!! How do you like them apples, God?  *hides*

Moved in with Rev for the weekend. My mother threw a hissy. But oh well. We had a lot of fun. Watched plenty of movies, ate plenty of yummy goodies. Played a fair share of Super Nintendo. I painted while Rev played Mario with 75 lives, so doing stupid things like jumping straight into a hole and dying at the start of a level was considered fun. And fun-NY. I absolutely adore Harold and Kumar. I want some White Castle. And I want to marry Kumar. "Thank you, come again!" hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha
Good stuff. Am I the only one that can't help but make up songs to the music on Mario? I mean... it just plays over and over and before you know it words are flowing out. And they are usually pretty ridiculous. And Rev will join in. And we'll fall over and die a little from a laughing fit. I've gotta fever and the doctor says the only cure is a little more mario. "did you fuck my mother? did you fuck my mother? yes i fucked your mother. yes i fucked your mother. yes i fucked her, and you may ask her, and she'll say it was good." yeah. if you can figure out the mario tune to that then sing out my friends. because we certainly did. we had a whole story going about this guy that had sex with his friend's mother. lol. jeezie creezie. crazy? i was crazy once...

boyfriends are love
brought to you by the isLove Generator

Going to the gym is so effing wonderful. I feel great. Because I get to swim for hours. And run. And whatever I wanna do. And of course... there's the naked fat ladies that make life worth living in the locker room. Heh Heh. Gotta love it. I still smell like poolness. That's always fun. 

I didnt go into school until 6th period and it was great. I slept in. Took a shower. Ate breakfast. Watched Stepford Wives. Slept some more. Got ready. Then I called myself in a check-in and stood around at 1st lunch for a bit before finally going to class. Then I read The Secret Garden in Drama. And I got in trouble with my friends in Orchestra for playing in the kiddie toys with the lights off. What a wonderful day. 

I should probably do my homework. Yup. That's what I'm gonna do now. Cuz I'm smart. *looks around* Not a word, kiddos. Not a word.

A fight between two friends. (Me and Brandon)
